text: Guillermo Rodríguez Melgarejo (20 May 1943 - 4 January 2021) was an Argentine Roman Catholic bishop. Melgarejo was born in Buenos Aires, Argentina. He became a priest in 1970. Melgarejo was titular bishop of Ucres and as auxiliary bishop of the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Buenos Aires from 1994 to 2003 and as bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of San Martín in Argentina from 2003 to 2018. Melgarejo died on 4 January 2021, aged 77.Roman Catholic Diocese of San Martín in Argentina ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Argentine Roman Catholic bishops Category:People from Buenos Aires
title: Guillermo Rodríguez Melgarejo
